question: You work for an international company. You have seen an advertisement for a training course which will be useful for your jobWrite a letter to your manager. In your letterdescribe the training course you want to doexplain what the company could do to help yousay how the course will be useful for your job
text: The main endeavour of writing this letter is to express my interest in attending an international course which is “sales marketing”.  Last week, I saw an advertisement about this in the daily newspapers and I am reading all the information about it. This course is being held by the Oracle company which is settled in London. I find it is more convenient because it is online coaching. This is one week course and will be starting from 25th January and the timings are from 8:00 am to 5:00 pm.

I would be grateful if the company may support me to take this opportunity. Since the course fees are extremely high, it would be support for me if the organization could pay fifty per cent of the fees. Moreover, I would require to take the leaves for seven days as it is a full-time course.

As per my perspective, this course would be more essential in many ways so please let me take a moment to elaborate how this program will be decisive. Firstly, it would not only help to increase product selling but also it would help to export our products in the other countries and, as a result, we can touch with a number of customers and able to get more profit.
I look forward to hearing from you.
